titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 390 Item 2858: Bhuśuddhibhūtaśuddhiprāṇapratiṣṭhā Antaramātṛkābahimātṛkā

notesStmt.note: Title from colophon, which also provides the title Bhūtaśuddhiprāṇapratiṣṭhā Antamātṛkābahimātṛkā. C.f. UPenn Ms. Coll. 390, Item 1434 and Item 1380, etc.

Fair condition. Leaves very brown. The manuscript is torn accross the lower left corner. Ff. 4 and 8 are colored yellow. Text has no dandas. Mistakes written over or indicated by short vertical strokes. One lengthy marginal addition in another hand.

Begins, f. 1v: o ̐ācamya. pr̄aṇān āyamya. deśakālau smṛtvā. vrāhme mūhurtte cotthāya scaśīrṣe sahasradalāmbujodaraṁ karṇikāmadhye śrīgurupādukāṁ dhyātvā (verse 1). ādhāranābhihṛdaye bhrūmadhye śrīmadakṣararūpaṁ śivaṁ dhyātvā tatprabhā puñjapiñjarīkṛta (verse 2).
Text ends, f. 8v: mukhe saṁ namaḥ nāsāyāṁ haṁ namaḥ netrayoḥ oṁ namaḥ lalāṭe ks̄aṁ namaḥ vraṁhmarandhre.

Colophon, f. 8v: iti barhirmātṛkanyāsaḥ. 15 samāptā iti bhūtaśuddhiprāṇapratiṣṭhā antamātṛkābahimātṛkā samāptā bhuśuddhibhūtaśuddhiprāṇapratiṣṭhā antaramātṛkābahimātṛkā samāptāḥ. śrīdurgādevyāi namaḥ.
